titles.title: Health Savings Account Affordability Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the use of health savings accounts for the payment of health insurance premiums for high deductible health plans purchased in the individual market.
Health Savings Account Affordability Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Health Savings Account Affordability Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the payment of insurance premiums for high deductible health plans from health savings accounts.
